name: Grave Quadrant
description:
Grave Quadrant is a short game where you attack ghosts and scarecrows in a graveyard.

Mechanically, it’s basically a very small demake of Slay The Spire, except that status effects are used as card cost. The more effects you have, the more cards you can play each turn:

Thematically, it’s Halloween.

I made this as part of relearning Unity so I can finish other projects I’ve put off.

Sound effects from Kenney on OpenGameArt and from ZapSplat.

Have fun!
